attributes.action: No commercial fisherman ie rod and lines to have a day license to fish
attributes.background: non-commercial fisherman to have a day license to fish or the  sure as us  commercial fisherman has to pay for a license to be able to sell are fish  and all quoters when known commercial road liners are allowed to take as many fish home as  they like without quoters  and can sell  with no police

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
